title: Diagnostic Questions: Revealing Misconceptions
description: One-minute skill: Diagnostic Questions: Revealing Misconceptions.

hook.text: Wrong answers aren't randomâ€”they reveal exactly what students misunderstand.

buildup.text: Diagnostic questions are designed so each wrong answer maps to a specific misconception.

discovery.text: A well-crafted diagnostic question tells the teacher more than a correct answer ever could.

twist.text: Writing good diagnostic questions is harder than writing the lesson itself.

climax.text: Teachers who diagnose misconceptions before reteaching save time and increase understanding.

punchline.text: The wrong answer is the most informative answer.

quiz.question: What makes a diagnostic question different from a regular quiz question?
